titles.title: Health Centers Reauthorization Act of 1994
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize migrant, community and homeless health center programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3978)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

bill.summary: 3/25/1994--Introduced. Health Centers Reauthorization Act of 1994 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize migrant, community, and homeless health center programs, and health services programs for residents of public housing.
